#summary Description of a Compound
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

A Compound is the collective name for a function of the application. Compounds consist of a [http://code.google.com/p/boundless/wiki/Controller Controller], [http://code.google.com/p/boundless/wiki/Model Model], and [http://code.google.com/p/boundless/wiki/View View].


= Details =

Compounds are the workhorses of a Boundless application. They are essentially a group of functions that access a common database table for different purposes, and the associated template files to display the output of each function.
